en: 易经占卜 • Ancient Wisdom for Modern Seekers
zh: 易经占卜 • 古老智慧 现代启迪

en: Hold it silently in your mind as you prepare to cast.
zh: 在准备占卜时将问题默默记在心中

en: Use three ancient coins to generate six lines forming your hexagram.
zh: 用三枚古钱币生成六爻，构成你的卦象

en: Get an initial reading and unlock deeper insights.
zh: 获得初步解读并解锁更深层的洞察

en: The I Ching (Yijing) has guided seekers for over 3000 years.
zh: 易经已为求道者指引方向超过3000年

en: Let its ancient wisdom illuminate your path forward.
zh: 让古老的智慧照亮你前行的道路

en: Focus on your question as the coins are thrown
zh: 投掷铜钱时专注于你的问题

en: Cast all six lines at once automatically
zh: 自动一次性投掷所有六爻

en: Cast one line at a time with each shake
Coins will appear here during casting
zh: 铜钱将在占卜时出现在此处
你的卦象将在此处形成
卦象完成！正在准备你的解读...

en: The oracle has spoken. Here is your initial reading.
zh: 神谕已现。这是你的初步解读

en: Describe your question to receive personalized guidance
zh: 描述你的问题以获得个性化指引

en: Moving lines transform this hexagram into:
This transformation adds depth to your reading
zh: 此变化为你的解读增添了深度

en: Get a personalized AI interpretation that speaks directly to your specific question and situation.
zh: 获得针对你具体问题和情况的个性化AI解读

en: Describe your question in your own words
zh: 用你自己的话描述你的问题

en: For example: Should I accept the new job offer? I'm feeling uncertain about leaving my current position...
zh: 例如：我是否应该接受新的工作机会？我对离开当前职位感到不确定...

en: The more context you provide the more insightful the interpretation will be.
zh: 你提供的背景越多，解读就会越有洞察力

en: Sign in to unlock detailed readings
Enter your email to access personalized interpretations from the oracle.
zh: 输入你的邮箱以访问神谕的个性化解读

en: This is a demo. Your email is only stored locally and never sent to any server.
zh: 这是一个演示。你的邮箱仅存储在本地，永远不会发送到任何服务器

en: Please enter a valid email address
zh: 请输入有效的邮箱地址

en: Review your past consultations with the oracle
zh: 回顾你过去与神谕的对话

en: Your divination history will appear here once you complete your first reading.
zh: 完成第一次占卜后，你的占卜历史将在此显示

en: Hex Oracle • Ancient Wisdom for Modern Seekers
zh: 易经占卜 • 古老智慧 现代启迪

en: An error occurred. Please try again.
Failed to get interpretation from the oracle.
Network error. Please check your connection.
zh: 网络错误。请检查你的连接
